Message: Strong growth in e-commerce sales and sales in China drive record revenue and earnings
Boycott by consumers due to controversial social media campaign hurts brand image and sales
Successful treasure hunt promotion drives increased customer traffic and spending in stores
Global supply chain disruptions lead to inventory shortages and higher product costs
Expansion into new athletic wear categories like hiking and outdoor apparel increases market share
Safety recall of popular yoga pants due to quality control issues damages brand trust
Strategic acquisition of a popular streetwear brand expands VF's product portfolio and attracts younger demographics
Unfavorable weather conditions lead to weak sales of seasonal apparel lines
Successful launch of a new handbag line featuring a popular celebrity collaboration drives up sales
Counterfeiting of popular Coach brand products increases in key markets, hurting brand image and revenue
Strong growth in the luxury apparel market in China benefits Ralph Lauren's high-end product lines
Departing creative director leads to a lack of design direction and a decline in brand appeal
Strategic acquisition of a popular online fashion brand expands PVH's e-commerce presence
Rising cotton prices due to global shortages increase production costs and pressure profit margins
Successful marketing campaign for a new line of eco-friendly underwear resonates with consumers
Product safety recall of a popular sock line due to a manufacturing defect hurts brand trust
